price: 3. „Argi po mirties, kai tapsime dulkėmis, (būsime prikelti?) Toks sugrįžimas yra neįmanomas.“
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
